item.title: Permission denied (publickey,gssapi-keyex,gssapi-with-mic)
item.description: 1[icasimpan@icasimpan ~]$ ssh icasimpan@204.48.29.45 2The authenticity of host '204.48.29.45 (204.48.29.45)' can't be established. 3ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:/g89dBppp6ir72D3dUvHFm4de2k3NPtYKOOfNkUkFQQ. 4ECDSA key fingerprint is MD5:58:41:92:ed:e1:55:52:3f:69:6a:e5:27:7a:dd:98:6a. 5Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yes 6Warning: Permanently added '204.48.29.45' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts. 7Permission denied (publickey,gssapi-keyex,gssapi-with-mic). In both source and destination machine, make sure to edit /etc/ssh/ssh_config and add 1PasswordAuthentication yes Then restart sshd
